text: Don Felipe Juan Froilán de Todos los Santos de Marichalar y Borbón (born 17 July 1998 in Madrid) is the elder child and only son of the Duchess of Lugo, Infanta Elena of Spain, and Don Jaime de Marichalar. Felipe is fourth in the line of succession to the Spanish Throne, after his mother. ==References== Category:Spanish infantes and infantas Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Madrid
title: Felipe de Marichalar y Borbón
